text: Nikkolas Smith is an activist born in Houston, Texas 1985. Nikkolas Smith is the author of many children's books including, "That Flag", "The Artivist" and "President Austin". Many of Nikkolas Smith's books are involved with black culture. title: Nikkolas Smith
